briefTitle: HR Positive, HER2 Negative Advanced Breast Cancer With Progression After Endocrine Therapy
officialTitle: A Phase II Clinical Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Recombinant hLAG-3 Fusion Protein (EOC202) Injection Combined With Albumin-bound Paclitaxel in Treatment of the Patients With HR Positive, HER2 Negative Advanced Breast Cancer With Progression After Endocrine Therapy
